QuestData.Title: Breaking the Bonds
QuestData.Description: From the deep...$BA realm of darkness and fire.$BGrasping in my slumber.$B$BI am ensnared, $r.$B$BShadows lurk in the rods of fire beside me.$BSlay them.$BThat I may be free again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disable the two Rods of Subjugation that bind Tortolla.
QuestData.CompletionText: They are not of this world.$B$BThey know neither pity nor fear.
QuestData.RewardText: <Tortolla quivers and shakes debris free from his great back.>$B$BYou...$BAre not like the others.$B$BI am free once again.$B$BThe others...$BWill pay.
